name: heatproof

effect.black_white: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire-type moves and burns.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire-type moves and burns.

short_effect: Halves damage from fire moves and burns.

flavor_text.black_white: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
